sources.title: Nora Helmer (1974)
sources.description: A beautiful young housewife, Nora, is trying to convince her tight-laced, bourgeois husband, Torvald, to give her some extra money for the holidays, even if he has to borrow it. Fassbinder's interpretation of "A dolls house".

metadata.Plot: A beautiful young housewife, Nora, is trying to convince her tight-laced, bourgeois husband, Torvald, to give her some extra money for the holidays, even if he has to borrow it. Fassbinder's interpretation of "A dolls house".
metadata.Writer: Rainer Werner Fassbinder, Henrik Ibsen, Bernhard Schulze
metadata.Actors: Margit Carstensen, Joachim Hansen, Barbara Valentin
